title: UI Designer v2
content: Refactoring the low-code interface for a simpler and more intuitive process digitization experience.

title: UI for Test Generation
content: Development of a user interface that allows for on-the-fly test generation across any environment.

title: Integration with Flink Technology for Streaming Operations on Kafka Queues
content: In order to convert analytical operations from batch processes to real-time streaming operations, we are implementing Flink technology, which enables complex operations on streaming data from Kafka queues.

title: Codebase Update
content: Updating the automation codebase to keep pace with technological advancements.

title: UI Runtime Automation v2
content: Refactoring the operational management interface for running digitalized processes.

title: Wizard and Automation Startup
content: Development of a user interface that enables the deployment and startup of automations.

title: Modular Automations
content: Development of pre-configured automations with specific tasks that can be used in a modular way to construct processes, thereby reducing implementation time.

title: Adding Event-Driven Architecture
content: Introduction of an event-driven architecture for automation operation to complement the current polling architecture.

title: Load JARs at Runtime
content: Introducing the functionality to update automation code at runtime, allowing patches or upgrades to be applied without interrupting process execution.
